AI Description: DendroPy is a flexible and modular phylogenetic computing library in Python, offering reading, writing, simulation, and manipulation of phylogenetic trees and associated data.
Core Features: Read & Write Phylogenetic Tree Files In Various Formats, Perform Tree Manipulations, Transformations, & Calculations, Simulate Trees Under A Variety Of Models & Conditions, Analyze & Visualize Phylogenetic Data, Supports A Wide Range Of Phylogenetic Analysis Tools & Methods
General Tags: Phylogenetics, Computational Biology, Python Library, Bioinformatics, Phylogenetic Trees
